mapper.select: select count(1) from seller_category_brand_shield where seller_id = #{shopId} and brand_id = #{brandId} and third_category_id = #{cid};

SELECT i.item_id, group_concat(ica.attr_id,":",ia.attr_name) c_attr_id_name, group_concat(ica.attr_id,":",iav.value_id) c_attrId_valueId, group_concat(iav.value_id,":",iav.value_name) c_valueId_valueName, i.attributes attr_id, i.item_qualification attr_name, i.attr_sale attr_sale_value FROM item i, item_category_attr ica, item_attribute ia, item_category_attr_value icav, item_attribute_value iav WHERE i.cid = ica.cid AND ica.attr_id = ia.attr_id AND icav.cid = ica.cid AND iav.attr_id = ia.attr_id AND i.modified >= #{syncTime} AND i.item_id = #{itemId} GROUP BY i.item_id

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_code, i.seller_id, i.item_picture_url, i.shop_id, i.cid, i.shop_cid, i.brand, i.attributes attr_id, i.has_vip_price, i.product_channel_code, i.create_id, i.create_name, i.created, i.modify_id, i.modify_name, i.modified, i.listting_time, isbp.retail_price as retail_price, isbp.area_sale_price as area_sale_price FROM item AS i INNER JOIN item_sku_base_price AS isbp ON i.item_id = isbp.item_id WHERE i.product_channel_code = '3010' and i.modified >= #{syncTime} limit #{start},#{end}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM item AS i INNER JOIN item_sku_base_price AS isbp ON i.item_id = isbp.item_id WHERE i.product_channel_code = '3010' and i.modified >= #{syncTime}

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_code, i.seller_id, i.item_picture_url, i.shop_id, i.cid, i.shop_cid, i.brand, i.attributes attr_id, i.has_vip_price, i.product_channel_code, i.create_id, i.create_name, i.created, i.modify_id, i.modify_name, i.modified, i.listting_time, sum(ispi0.display_quantity) as area_display_quantity FROM item AS i INNER JOIN item_sku_publish_info AS ispi0 ON i.item_id = ispi0.item_id AND ispi0.is_box_flag = 0 INNER JOIN item_sku_ladder_price AS islp ON i.item_id = islp.item_id WHERE i.product_channel_code = '20' and i.modified >= #{syncTime} GROUP BY i.item_id limit #{start},#{end}

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_code, i.seller_id, i.item_picture_url, i.shop_id, i.cid, i.shop_cid, i.brand, i.attributes attr_id, i.has_vip_price, i.product_channel_code, i.create_id, i.create_name, i.created, i.modify_id, i.modify_name, i.modified, i.listting_time, ti.sku_timelimited_price FROM item AS i INNER JOIN timelimited_info as ti on i.item_id = ti.item_id INNER JOIN promotion_info as pi on pi.promotion_id = ti.promotion_id WHERE i.modified >= #{syncTime} GROUP BY i.item_id limit #{start},#{end}
